name: Записи
get_data_query: SELECT R.id, R.date, E.name, S.name, C.name, R.status FROM records R INNER JOIN employees E ON R.employee = E.name INNER JOIN services S ON R.service = S.name INNER JOIN clients C ON R.client = C.name;
insert_data_query: INSERT INTO records (name, date, employee, service, client, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
update_data_query: UPDATE records SET name=?, date=?, employee=?, service=?, client=?, status=? WHERE id = ?;
